title: Google Play Service Location not working
content:
I have setup my new Pixel 4 XL. And I am facing a serious issue with GPS.

Google Map always using the network location and it is not accurate nor in time. I have to reboot my device to make it work with GPS signals, and 2 minutes later it will use network location only again. If I turn off the Google Location Accuracy, I cannot even get my location at all.

I downloaded GPS Test in Google Play Store and it shows that GPS signals are great.


I downloaded another map app called AMap, it works properly.

I downloaded GPS Fix in Google Play Store, it shows below:


Apparently there are something wrong with Google Play Services, I checked Location Permissions that Google Play has all time location permission.

I also tried to reboot into safe mode the issue is same.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
